name: Hill Racing
description:
Hill Racing is an indie game with a retro style in which you drive a truck on a difficult terrain, where you will have to play with the speed and inclination of the truck if you do not want to lose.

The scenario on which the truck in Hill Racing leads is infinite, and in addition to being infinite, it is generated randomly, that will help the game experience to be different between one game and another.
Apart, you will see a very marked style, with simple and retro graphics and a very marked photograph in the dark, playing with the points of light and shadows.

It may seem a simple game first, but the game has an extreme difficulty, since the driving of the truck is very complex, for several reasons:

-The acceleration and brake of the truck are abrupt, this can cause the truck to overturn, and if the truck overturns you will lose.

-The terrain gains difficulty and unforeseen situations because it is generated randomly.

With this background, if you want to have a good time and try to get as far as possible, surpassing your own records, Hill Racing is the perfect game for anyone
